pullrequest.title: Getting the error ‘thread’ in namespace ‘std’ does not name a type private: std::thread rosQueueThread. Using boost works even if STL does not contain all C++11 features.

content.raw:
Hi @katanachan , thanks for the contribution!

The tutorial you're trying to change is for Gazebo 6, which requires C++11. So I'm afraid that even if we change this detail here, the rest of the tutorial might not work.
content.html:
Hi @katanachan , thanks for the contribution!

The tutorial you're trying to change is for Gazebo 6, which requires C++11. So I'm afraid that even if we change this detail here, the rest of the tutorial might not work.
